game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that the lost artifact is hidden within a forgotten ruin deep in the jungle. Your quest is to find it and bring it back to the village elder.

task.description: Study ancient maps and talk to locals for information on the ruins' whereabouts.
Bypass any traps or obstacles that guard the entrance to the ruins.
Search the ruins thoroughly until you locate the ancient artifact.
